info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 11 at 6:11PM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...SOUTHERN CONWAY...NORTHWESTERN FAULKNER... NORTHEASTERN YELL AND SOUTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 610 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adona, or near Perryville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Conway... Morrilton... Perryville... Greenbrier... Wooster... Oppelo... Twin Groves... Menifee... Perry... Adona... Houston... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Pickles Gap... Solgohachia... Petit Jean State Park... Mallet Town... Springhill... Toad Suck... Springfield... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 101 and 132. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
